Which state matter definite volume definite shape? gas liquid solid Which following best describes mass solid block ice? matter block space block takes force gravity acting block distance molecules block In Everglades, body condition American alligator closely related water depth. When water levels rise high, animal species disperse broader area, causing decrease body condition inability locate sufficient food sources. When water levels fall, animal species gather smaller areas, allowing alligators hunt effectively. A glass bottle A metal A plastic bottle An apple core A lake received runoff surrounding farmland healthy fish population. Several years ago, new type pesticide treat crops. A car rolling level street. What car stop moving? force pushes straight force pushes straight force pushes direction car moving force pushes opposite direction car moving Which chemical equations demonstrates law conservation mass applies combustion ethane? From year year, farmers rotate different crops fields improve soil nutrients. Why crop rotation effective pest management method? It allows chemicals kill pests. It creates crops pest-resistant. A science teacher filled balloon helium gas second balloon carbon dioxide. The helium-filled balloon rose ceiling, balloon filled carbon dioxide fell floor. Which source data Nevada resources likely current reliable? science encyclopedia article local newspaper government-maintained website student's classroom presentation Why rocks pebbles riverbeds usually smooth? The rocks pebbles riverbeds old. The rocks pebbles rub water flows them. Rivers flow smooth rocks pebbles. Organisms rivers break rocks pebbles. Which adaptation helps animal attract mate? hibernation camouflage coloration migration Which protist bi-flagellate autotroph? amoeba euglena paramecium volvox What likely measure investigation water cycle? wind speed ozone layer natural gas emissions precipitation amounts Currently, Antarctica coldest driest place Earth. Paleontologists dinosaur fossils rock layers ice. Based evidence, reasonable conclusion climate Antarctica past? Antarctica climate present. At time past, Antarctica hot, dry desert. At time past, Antarctica warmer wetter. At time past, Antarctica colder wetter now. A large, solid spherical body solar classified moon. Which characteristic body gives classification? It rotates axis. It lacks liquid water. It orbits nearby planet. It reflects light star. Miguel conducting experiment. He wrote following sentences notebook: The starting temperature water 10 degrees Celsius. An object weighing 5 grams placed water. The temperature water increased 15 degrees. The object hotter 10 degrees. Why skin considered organ? It cells. It acts barrier. It tissues. It organism. Which food provides energy body shortest time? potato meat milk fruit Screech owls color variations-red grey.
